definition: elderly man/father/father-in-law/neck feathers of a bird (old)

sentences.english: India's millionaire population grew 23% last year, the fastest in the world.
sentences.chinese: 去年印度的百萬富翁增加了23%，增幅居全球之冠。
他有個百萬富翁的父親。

sentences.english: The millionaire's property descended to his eldest son.
sentences.chinese: 那個百萬富翁的財產傳給了他的長子。

sentences.english: Multi-millionaire Coleen is due to give birth any day.
sentences.chinese: 百萬富翁科林哪天肯定會生小孩。

sentences.english: The millionaire loved money above all other things.
sentences.chinese: 這個百萬富翁愛錢勝過任何東西。

sentences.english: He suffered a great deal in his childhood, but he died a millionaire.
sentences.chinese: 他小的時候很苦，但去世時是一個百萬富翁。

sentences.english: A: What would you do if you were a millionaire, Andy?
sentences.chinese: 安迪，如果你是個百萬富翁，你會做什麼？

sentences.english: If she saw a goldfinch, she would marry a millionaire.
sentences.chinese: 如果她看到一隻金翅雀，則可能嫁給一位百萬富翁。

sentences.english: Millionaire, high-performance bankers on the 73rd floor did not appreciate the interruption.
sentences.chinese: 73樓的百萬富翁和精明銀行家不喜歡被人打斷。

sentences.english: I don’t mind really if millionaires vote against me.
sentences.chinese: 我真的不介意百萬富翁投反對票反對我。

sentences.english: That venture made him a millionaire.
sentences.chinese: 那次投機買賣使他成了百萬富翁。

sentences.english: Running an economically productive house is one of the hallmarks of millionaires.
sentences.chinese: 經濟地運營一間多產的房屋，是很多百萬富翁的標誌。
讀一下《隔壁的百萬富翁》。

sentences.english: The average age of the millionaires is 46.
sentences.chinese: 調查結果還顯示，百萬富翁平均年齡是46歲。

sentences.english: When Tony married the millionaire's daughter, he certainly went up in the world.
sentences.chinese: 託尼娶了那百萬富翁之女爲妻後，肯定發達了。

sentences.english: During the last ten years, he has made a amount of money to become a millionaire.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的十年中他賺了很多錢成爲百萬富翁。

definition: private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
public/publicly (owned, financed, operated etc)/run by the state
Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development, OECD/abbr. for 經濟合作與發展組織|经济合作与发展组织
